Method Detail

clone

public Channel clone(boolean originalState,
                     Channel toClone)
Creates a cloned channel based off the info contained within this object and the packages in the toClone

Parameters:
originalState - if false clone all packages and errata, if true only clone the original packages and no errata
toClone - the channel to clone
Returns:
the cloned channel

Verifies a potential name for a channel
